title: A Ride or Die Kind of Love
description: A Ride or Die Kind of Love – A Biker Boxed SetStories by:One Ride - Chelsea CamaronDeadly Seduction - Selene Chardou Craving Constellations - Nicole JacquelynHell's Knights - Bella JewelSaving Dallas - Kim JonesBeyond Shame - Kit RochaUndeniable - Madeline SheehanMirage - Ashley SuzanneWe’re excited to bring you this collaboration of novels that feature men on motorcycles. If you love the wind in your hair, hands in the air and being swept off your feet by a man in leather, this set of novels is just for you.After all, loving a biker is a ride or die kind of love! Enjoy,Chelsea, Selene, Nicole, Bella, Kim, Kit, Madeline and Ashley.
author: Chelsea Camaron
